item.title: About me
item.description: Who am I? Hi, my name is Sara Fecadu. I’m a software engineer at Nordstrom.

item.title: 64-bit floating point: a JavaScript story
item.description: Originally posted: 09/20/2017 In this post, Iâ€™ll shed some light on how JavaScript handles its numbers. We will go down to the binary and back up. Why write about numbers in JavaScript? It seems to be common knowledge that JavaScript has a single and unpredictable number type, 64-bit floating point. Watch out! But, whenever I look for more information on what to watch out for,I see the exact same example:
